The shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to tackle other challenges as much as Page's ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google Inc. dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. Eric Schmidt , 55, will still be available to advise Page, 37, and Google Inc. 's other 37-year-old founder, Sergey Brin

The company has lived up to its promise to launch 16 all-new or significantly refreshed vehicles in the past 12 months, said CEO Sergio Marchionne . for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role- and may even be unusual for sitting CEOs, said David Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. "It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat," Wise said.
